CustomField.formula: if(OR( IsPickVal(amc__Status__c, "Complete"), IsPickVal(amc__Status__c, "Cancelled"), amc__Hours_Completed__c > amc__Hours_Scheduled__c), 0, amc__Hours_Scheduled__c - amc__Hours_Completed__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Identifies the Hours Remaining - Billable. (Previously Labelled Hours Remaining)
CustomField.label: Hours Remaining - Billable
